mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (id, targetBlogId, targetId, targetDisplayId, commentType, displayId, writerId,contents, dateCreated) VALUES (#{id}, #{target.blog.id}, #{target.id}, #{target.displayId}, #{target.type}, #{displayId}, #{writer.loginId}, #{contents}, #{dateCreated})
mapper.update: update comment set contents = #{contents} where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT c.id as id, c.targetBlogId as "target.blog.id", c.targetId as "target.id", c.targetDisplayId as "target.displayId", c.commentType as "target.type", c.displayId as displayId, c.writerId as "writer.loginId", c.contents as contents, c.dateCreated as dateCreated FROM comment c
mapper.select: JOIN post p ON p.id = c.targetId JOIN category ca on ca.id = p.categoryId JOIN blogs b on b.id = ca.blogId WHERE ca.blogId = #{blogId} AND c.commentType = #{type} ORDER BY c.id DESC LIMIT 1
